card.name: Arc Trail
card.text: Arc Trail deals 2 damage to target creature or player and 1 damage to another target creature or player.

card.name: Armillary Sphere
card.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Armillary Sphere: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Armored Griffin
card.text: Flying, vigilance

card.name: Assassinate
card.text: Destroy target tapped creature.

card.name: Augury Owl
card.text: Flying When Augury Owl enters the battlefield, scry 3.

card.name: Aura Gnarlid
card.text: Creatures with power less than Aura Gnarlid's power can't block it. Aura Gnarlid gets +1/+1 for each Aura on the battlefield.

card.name: Auramancer
card.text: When Auramancer enters the battlefield, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Auratouched Mage
card.text: When Auratouched Mage enters the battlefield, search your library for an Aura card that could enchant it. If Auratouched Mage is still on the battlefield, put that Aura card onto the battlefield attached to it. Otherwise, reveal the Aura card and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Awakening Zone
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token onto the battlefield. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C} to your mana pool."

card.name: Baleful Strix
card.text: Flying, deathtouch When Baleful Strix enters the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Beast Within
card.text: Destroy target permanent. Its controller puts a 3/3 green Beast creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Beetleback Chief
card.text: When Beetleback Chief enters the battlefield, put two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield.

card.name: Bituminous Blast
card.text: Cascade Bituminous Blast deals 4 damage to target creature.

card.name: Boar Umbra
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3. Totem armor

card.name: Bramble Elemental
card.text: Whenever an Aura becomes attached to Bramble Elemental, put two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens onto the battlefield.

card.name: Brindle Shoat
card.text: When Brindle Shoat dies, put a 3/3 green Boar creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Brutalizer Exarch
card.text: When Brutalizer Exarch enters the battlefield, choose one - Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it; or put target noncreature permanent on the bottom of its owner's library.

card.name: Cadaver Imp
card.text: Flying When Cadaver Imp enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Cage of Hands
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block. {1}{W}: Return Cage of Hands to its owner's hand.

card.name: Cancel
card.text: Counter target spell.

card.name: Celestial Ancient
card.text: Flying Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

card.name: Concentrate
card.text: Draw three cards.

card.name: Cultivate
card.text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, and put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Dark Hatchling
card.text: Flying When Dark Hatchling enters the battlefield, destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Deny Reality
card.text: Cascade Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Dimir Aqueduct
card.text: Dimir Aqueduct enters the battlefield tapped. When Dimir Aqueduct enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {U}{B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Dimir Infiltrator
card.text: Dimir Infiltrator can't be blocked. Transmute {1}{U}{B}

card.name: Dowsing Shaman
card.text: {2}{G}, {T}: Return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Dragonlair Spider
card.text: Reach Whenever an opponent casts a spell, put a 1/1 green Insect creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Dreampod Druid
card.text: At the beginning of each upkeep, if Dreampod Druid is enchanted, put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Elderwood Scion
card.text: Trample, lifelink Spells you cast that target Elderwood Scion cost {2} less to cast. Spells your opponents cast that target Elderwood Scion cost {2} more to cast.

card.name: Enigma Sphinx
card.text: Flying When Enigma Sphinx is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, put it into your library third from the top. Cascade

card.name: Erratic Explosion
card.text: Choose target creature or player. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card. Erratic Explosion deals damage equal to that card's converted mana cost to that creature or player. Put the revealed cards on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Etherium-Horn Sorcerer
card.text: {1}{U}{R}: Return Etherium-Horn Sorcerer to its owner's hand. Cascade

card.name: Exotic Orchard
card.text: {T}: Add to your mana pool one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.

card.name: Farsight Mask
card.text: Whenever a source an opponent controls deals damage to you, if Farsight Mask is untapped, you may draw a card.

card.name: Felidar Umbra
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has lifelink. {1}{W}: Attach Felidar Umbra to target creature you control. Totem armor

card.name: Fiery Conclusion
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Fiery Conclusion, sacrifice a creature. Fiery Conclusion deals 5 damage to target creature.

card.name: Fiery Fall
card.text: Fiery Fall deals 5 damage to target creature. Basic landcycling {1}{R}

card.name: Fires of Yavimaya
card.text: Creatures you control have haste. Sacrifice Fires of Yavimaya: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Flayer Husk
Fling
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Fling, sacrifice a creature. Fling deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to target creature or player.

card.name: Fractured Powerstone
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Roll the planar die. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Ghostly Prison
card.text: Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature he or she controls that's attacking you.

card.name: Glen Elendra Liege

card.text: Defender, flying Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to Guard Gomazoa.

card.text: Fear {2}{U}{B}: Each unblocked creature becomes 4/1 until end of turn.

card.name: Krond the Dawn-Clad
card.text: Flying, vigilance Whenever Krond the Dawn-Clad attacks, if it's enchanted, exile target permanent.

card.name: Krosan Verge
card.text: Krosan Verge enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Krosan Verge: Search your library for a Forest card and a Plains card and put them onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Last Stand
card.text: Target opponent loses 2 life for each Swamp you control. Last Stand deals damage equal to the number of Mountains you control to target creature. Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield for each Forest you control. You gain 2 life for each Plains you control. Draw a card for each Island you control, then discard that many cards.

card.name: Liliana's Specter
card.text: Flying When Liliana's Specter enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.

card.name: Lumberknot

card.name: Mark of Mutiny
card.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on it and untap it. That creature gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Mass Mutiny
card.text: For each opponent, gain control of up to one target creature that player controls until end of turn. Untap those creatures. They gain haste until end of turn.

card.name: Mistblade Shinobi
card.text: Ninjutsu {U} Whenever Mistblade Shinobi deals combat damage to a player, you may return target creature that player controls to its owner's hand.

card.name: Mitotic Slime
card.text: When Mitotic Slime dies, put two 2/2 green Ooze creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "When this creature dies, put two 1/1 green Ooze creature tokens onto the battlefield."

card.name: Mudbutton Torchrunner
card.text: When Mudbutton Torchrunner dies, it deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Whirlpool Warrior

card.text: Equipped creature can't be blocked and has shroud. Equip {2}
